translations: adj．最健壮的，最有吸引力的：指男性非常健壮、有吸引力。
· He is the hunkiest guy in the room.
他是房间里最有吸引力的男人。

sentences.sentence: That movie has the hunkiest heart throbs and the most romantic scenes on-screen this summer.
sentences.translation: 今年夏天(放映的电影中)，那部电影里有最健壮的男主角和最浪漫的景致。

sentences.sentence: For reasons that are still unclear, one of the hunkiest actors alive decided to sport a never-ending goatee last winter.
sentences.translation: 还有一些不太清楚的原因，这名现在最像东欧人的演员自去年冬天起就一直蓄着小羊胡子。
